caption.p: Detection of FMDV structural protein and FMDV capsid.

Notes: Immunofluorescence was used to determine expression of FMDV structural protein following transfection with pcDNA3.1/P12A3C ( A) or pcDNA3.1(+) ( B). The FMDV capsid was observed by TEM of BHK-21 cells transfected with pcDNA3.1/P12A3C ( C) and pcDNA3.1(+) ( D). Arrows show empty capsid structures ( C).
Abbreviations: FMDV, foot-and-mouth disease virus; TEM, transmission electron microscopy.
